member.name: T:WebSharper.Web.Control
member.summary: A base class for defining custom ASP.NET controls. Inherit from this class, override the Body property and use the new class as a Server ASP.NET control in your application.

member.summary: The full path to the application's root folder.

member.name: P:WebSharper.Web.IContext.RequestUri
member.summary: The URI of the web request.

member.name: T:WebSharper.Web.IContext
member.summary: Provides context about the web request being replied to.

member.name: P:WebSharper.Web.IUserSession.IsAvailable
member.summary: Check whether user sessions are currently available.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Web.IUserSession.LoginUser(System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Log in the given user. Set `persistent` to true to persist the login across browser sessions.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Web.IUserSession.GetLoggedInUser
member.summary: Retrieve the currently logged in user.

member.name: T:WebSharper.Web.IUserSession
member.summary: Manages user sessions in a web application.

member.name: T:WebSharper.Web.RpcModule
member.summary: The WebSharper RPC HttpModule. Handles RPC requests.

member.summary: Searches the page for a ScriptManager.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Web.ScriptManager.Register(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.String},System.Web.UI.Control)
member.summary: Registers a pagelet with the manager.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Web.ScriptManager.Find(System.Web.UI.Page)
member.summary: Finds an instance of ScriptManager on the page, throwing an exception if it is not present.

member.name: T:WebSharper.Web.ScriptManager
member.summary: The script manager control takes care of providing resources for the WebSharper pagelets used on the page. Every ASP.NET page should have one instance of this control in the head section.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Web.Remoting.GetContext
member.summary: Retrieve the current web context in an Rpc function. This function must be called from the thread from which the Rpc function is originally called. The returned object can be used throughout the Rpc function.

member.name: M:WebSharper.Web.RemotingExtensions.Server.HandleRequest(WebSharper.Core.Remoting.Server,WebSharper.Core.Remoting.Request,WebSharper.Web.IContext)
member.summary: Handle a request with the given web context.
